src/lib/components/DashCopilotkitCompone.description:
DashCopilotkitComponents is a comprehensive Dash component for CopilotKit integration.
It supports all 4 UI types: chat, popup, sidebar, and textarea.
The component can use either CopilotKit Cloud API key or bring your own key.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

ui_type.description:
The type of CopilotKit UI to render.
Options: 'chat', 'popup', 'sidebar', 'textarea'

api_key.description: Your API key for the language model (when bringing your own key).

runtime_url.description: The runtime URL for CopilotKit backend.

public_api_key.description: Your CopilotKit Cloud public API key.

instructions.description: Custom instructions for the AI assistant.

labels.description:
Labels configuration for the chat interface.
Should be an object with 'title' and 'initial' properties.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
